author: CBC News
title: There's talk of banning Russia from SWIFT. Here's what it is and why some countries are reluctant to do so | CBC News
description: Countries around the world have placed sanctions on Russia for invading Ukraine, and some are also calling for Moscow to be banned from the international banking system SWIFT. Here's the impact an expulsion from the Belgian-based financial transfer platform c…
